#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int arr[89];
void solve()
{
    arr[1]=1;
    arr[2]=1;
    for(int i=3;i<=88; i++)
    {
        arr[i]=arr[i-1] + arr[i-2];
        if(arr[i] %26 == 0)
            arr[i] =26;
        else
            arr[i] = arr[i]%26;

    }

}
int main()
{
    solve();
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while( t-- )
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        //int arr[n];
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            char ch=64+arr[i];
            cout<<ch;

        }
        cout<<endl;
    }

}
